items.title: Travelers Companies (NYSE:TRV) Reports Lower Q1 Earnings, Increases Dividend by 5%
items.description: Travelers Companies (NYSE:TRV) announced a 5% increase in their regular quarterly dividend and released their Q1 2025 earnings report, which revealed declining net income and EPS compared to the previous year. Despite these mixed results, the company's stock posted a 5.6% gain over the past week. In a broader context, this price move aligns with the overall positive market trend, where equities have gained ground, despite setbacks in technology and trade-related sectors. The Travelers'...

items.title: Travelers stock pops, Lockheed Martin upgrade, JB Hunt earnings
items.description: US stocks (^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^DJI) slipped as a drop in Nvidia (NVDA) shares weighed heavily on the tech sector. The Travelers Companies (TRV) shares popped after reporting a first quarter earnings beat. Lockheed Martin (LMT) shares rose after Morgan Stanley upgraded the stock and raised its price target.  Meanwhile, J.B. Hunt Transport (JBHT) shares fell despite a first quarter earnings beat.  Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
